name: Rise of Glu Glu
description:
Christmas is coming, the world-renowned "RAGNAROK OF THE TURKEYS". On this fateful date of the year, which occurs since the birth of a certain guy, turkeys have never had a rest. Every year they fight - with paws and beaks - against the army of Santa Claus who want to EAT THEM.

Like every year, the turkeys' goal is to escape from the slaughterhouse and reach the big heart of Christmas: The Big Uncle Claus. You, as the turkeys' last salvation, hope to give your brothers a better future by eliminating Santa Claus and introducing veganism as the new Christmas diet.

Arrive level 10 to defeat The Big Uncle Claus and win the game.
